fields.Title of Presentation: Enriching the Lives of Nursing Students through Financial Education
fields.Description/Abstract:
Considering the ever-changing financial landscape nursing students face; more nursing schools should consider the addition of financial education. Developing a course that contain topics to enhance personal financial knowledge would allow for students to begin planning for a financially savvy career and retirement.
Objectives:

  1.   Determine the need for a creative one-hour course to include financial education in nursing curriculum
  2.  Discuss the implementation of financial education into the nursing curriculum
  3.  Demonstrate the benefits to students in implanting a one-hour course to include financial education in nursing curriculum
